scripts.prebuild: node -p "'export const LIB_VERSION = ' + JSON.stringify(require('./package.json').version) + '; export const LIB_NAME = ' + JSON.stringify(require('./package.json').name) + ';'" > src/lib.ts
scripts.docs:install:
cb='```';echo "Install \`$npm_package_name\` via NPM:

$cb sh
 npm i $npm_package_name
$cb
" | replace-between --target README.md --token INSTALL
scripts.docs:license: echo "\`$npm_package_name\` is released under the **$(cat package.json | json license)** license. For more information, see the repository's [LICENSE](/LICENSE) file." | replace-between --target README.md --token LICENSE
scripts.docs: npm run docs:install && npm run docs:cli && npm run docs:reference && npm run docs:license
scripts.build:docs: npm run build && npm run docs
